item.description:
Cambridge Life Sciences Holiday Celebration
When: Thursday, December 16, from 4:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m.
Where: Boston Marriott Cambridge
2 Cambridge Center
Cambridge, MA 02142
Registration: http://www.bvsweb.com... attendees who register by December 14 will be entered to win an iPad
Once again, Biotech Vendor Services invites you to kick off the Holiday Season in grand style. Come mingle and enjoy networking with friends, colleagues and Life Sciences professionals from neighboring companies and institutes. As always, it promises to be a festive evening of networking and fun, not to mention the fabulous food! Bring a friend, or make a new one.
item.name: Cambridge Life Sciences Holiday Celebration
